text:
Created attachment 32955
patch with proposed changes

- Relying on the order returned by HashMap is dubious.
  In my case it returned [slideMaster2, slideMaster1]

text:
Hi Mark,

thank you for your patch, but please also add test files and junit tests to 
your patches (not just this one).
I'm currently trying to reproduce the issue and write a test, but it would be 
easier with at least a example .pptx

Andi
Applied the patch with a modification for a NPE in r1694592
creator: kiwiwings@apache.org

text:
Hi Andi,

> thank you for your patch, but please also add test files and junit tests to

OK. Test cases should now be possible (now that I've found out where to define the POI.testdata.path in netbeans). We'll see how far I manage with useful junit tests...
